pair.title: Add a Sigenergy device
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the required fields.
pair.intro: Enter the details of your Sigenergy device
pair.setup_step1: Enable Modbus TCP: Modbus TCP is disabled by default on Sigenergy devices. You must manually enable it
pair.setup_step2: Find the IP address: The IP address of your Sigenergy device can be found in the Sigenergy app, under the System tab / System settings / Connectivity / Device tab / Ethernet or WLAN
pair.setup_step3: Modbus native address: A value between 1 and 246. Normally the value is 1, assuming you have one Sigenergy device.
pair.setup_step3_fixed247: Modbus native address: Do not change this value, it must be 247
pair.setup_step4: Network Access: Ensure your Homey can reach the Sigenergy device on the specified IP address and port (default: 502).
